snippet: Jon Lester was picked to start for the Cubs on opening night, April 5, against St. Louis. Lester signed a six-year, $155 million contract in December.
abstract: Chicago Cubs will start pitcher Jon Lester for opening night game against the St Louis Cardinals.
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester was picked to start for the Cubs on opening night, April 5, against St. Louis. Lester signed a six-year, $155 million contract in December.

headline.main: Cubs’ Lester Gets Nod in Opener
headline.print_headline: Cubs’ Lester Gets Nod in Opener
